successes.title: StoneTether - The Smallest Tracking Device at Long Range
successes.description: Ever Lose Your Keys, Worry About Losing Sight of Your Children, or Forget Something on a Trip?  No Longer, StoneTether Has You Covered!

Pledges.description:
Your name on the "Special People That Made StoneTether Possible" on the StoneTether Site.
Of course you get a huge thank you from us, communication as we approach delivery of the first StoneTether devices, and invitations to any launch parties.

**Special Pricing For the First 250 Backers!!
Includes: One StoneTether device reserved and delivered from the first production in your choice of color (Gray, Black, Blue, or Pink).  Includes 1 carabiner clip and 2 mounting adhesives.
*Delivery is free within the United States
***Get An Additional StoneTether Free by Sharing Us on Facebook***

**Special Pricing For 500 Backers!!
Includes: One StoneTether device reserved and delivered from the first production in your choice of color (Gray, Black, Blue, or Pink).  Includes 1 carabiner clip and 2 mounting adhesives.
*Delivery is free within the United States
***Get An Additional StoneTether Free by Sharing Us on Facebook***
